    <title><![CDATA[Endangered Sumatran rhino gives birth in Indonesia]]></title>
    <link>http://www.ctvnews.ca/sci-tech/endangered-sumatran-rhino-gives-birth-in-indonesia-1.2900415</link>
    <description><![CDATA[A Sumatran rhinoceros has given birth at an Indonesian sanctuary in a success for efforts to save the critically endangered species.]]></description>
    <author></author>
              <creditLine><![CDATA[ The Associated Press]]></creditLine>
            <guid isPermaLink="false">1.2900415</guid>
    <pubDate>Thu, 12 May 2016 23:12:51 -0400</pubDate>
        <ctv:lastModifiedDate>Thu, 12 May 2016 23:12:51 -0400</ctv:lastModifiedDate>  
        			           <enclosure url="http://www.ctvnews.ca/polopoly_fs/1.2847297.1459941618!/httpImage/image.jpg_gen/derivatives/landscape_300/image.jpg"><![CDATA[A female Sumatran rhino named Ratu is seen with her newly-born calf at Way Kambas National Park in Lampung, Indonesia in this photo taken in 2012. (AP)]]></enclosure>
		 		         </item>
              <item>
    <title><![CDATA[Google wants new emojis to represent professional women]]></title>
    <link>http://www.ctvnews.ca/sci-tech/google-wants-new-emojis-to-represent-professional-women-1.2899239</link>
    <description><![CDATA[Google wants professional women to be better represented in emoji form.]]></description>
    <author></author>
              <creditLine><![CDATA[ The Canadian Press]]></creditLine>
            <guid isPermaLink="false">1.2899239</guid>
    <pubDate>Thu, 12 May 2016 11:02:59 -0400</pubDate>
        <ctv:lastModifiedDate>Thu, 12 May 2016 11:02:59 -0400</ctv:lastModifiedDate>  
        			           <enclosure url="http://www.ctvnews.ca/polopoly_fs/1.2825692.1458569000!/httpImage/image.jpg_gen/derivatives/landscape_300/image.jpg"><![CDATA[Emojis in the Snapchat app are shown in Toronto on Monday, March 7, 2016. ( Staff THE CANADIAN PRESS)]]></enclosure>
		 		         </item>
              <item>
    <title><![CDATA[Scientists find surprising varieties of life while mapping deep oceans]]></title>
    <link>http://www.ctvnews.ca/sci-tech/scientists-find-surprising-varieties-of-life-while-mapping-deep-oceans-1.2898730</link>
    <description><![CDATA[A humble, star-shaped creature that crawls across the floors of the seabed has helped a group of scientists that includes two Nova Scotian researchers come up with a map predicting surprising amounts of life in some of the world's deepest, darkest oceans.]]></description>
    <author></author>
          <dc:creator><![CDATA[Michael Tutton]]></dc:creator>
              <creditLine><![CDATA[ The Canadian Press]]></creditLine>
            <guid isPermaLink="false">1.2898730</guid>
    <pubDate>Thu, 12 May 2016 00:06:00 -0400</pubDate>
        <ctv:lastModifiedDate>Thu, 12 May 2016 00:06:00 -0400</ctv:lastModifiedDate>  
        			           <enclosure url="http://www.ctvnews.ca/polopoly_fs/1.2898735.1463025902!/httpImage/image.jpg_gen/derivatives/landscape_300/image.jpg"><![CDATA[A brittle star is shown in this undated handout photo. (THE CANADIAN PRESS/HO-Nick Hobgood)]]></enclosure>
		 		         </item>
              <item>
    <title><![CDATA[Facebook says 'trending topics' has built-in checks preventing ideological bias]]></title>
    <link>http://www.ctvnews.ca/sci-tech/facebook-says-trending-topics-has-built-in-checks-preventing-ideological-bias-1.2900098</link>
    <description><![CDATA[Facebook has pulled back the curtain on how its Trending Topics feature works, in reaction to a report in a tech blog that claimed Facebook downplays conservative news subjects. Facebook denies the report, which relied upon a single anonymous individual.]]></description>
    <author></author>
          <dc:creator><![CDATA[Mae Anderson]]></dc:creator>
              <creditLine><![CDATA[ The Associated Press]]></creditLine>
            <guid isPermaLink="false">1.2900098</guid>
    <pubDate>Thu, 12 May 2016 19:10:00 -0400</pubDate>
        <ctv:lastModifiedDate>Thu, 12 May 2016 22:54:00 -0400</ctv:lastModifiedDate>  
        			           <enclosure url="http://www.ctvnews.ca/polopoly_fs/1.2900106.1463094438!/httpImage/image.jpg_gen/derivatives/landscape_300/image.jpg"><![CDATA[FILE - In this March 15, 2013, file photo, a Facebook employee walks past a sign at Facebook headquarters in Menlo Park, Calif. (AP Photo/Jeff Chiu)]]></enclosure>
		 		         </item>
              <item>
    <title><![CDATA[UN: Rising air pollution in world's cities killing millions]]></title>
    <link>http://www.ctvnews.ca/sci-tech/un-rising-air-pollution-in-world-s-cities-killing-millions-1.2898828</link>
    <description><![CDATA[Almost everyone in large cities in poor and middle-income countries faces excessively high air pollution, a growing problem that is killing more than 3 million people each year and 'wreaking havoc on human health,' the World Health Organization said Thursday.]]></description>
    <author></author>
          <dc:creator><![CDATA[Jamey Keaten]]></dc:creator>
              <creditLine><![CDATA[ The Associated Press]]></creditLine>
            <guid isPermaLink="false">1.2898828</guid>
    <pubDate>Thu, 12 May 2016 06:39:00 -0400</pubDate>
        <ctv:lastModifiedDate>Thu, 12 May 2016 13:15:00 -0400</ctv:lastModifiedDate>  
        			           <enclosure url="http://www.ctvnews.ca/polopoly_fs/1.2898838.1463049452!/httpImage/image.jpg_gen/derivatives/landscape_300/image.jpg"><![CDATA[The Eiffel Tower is photographed through the smog in Paris on March 14, 2014. (AP / Jacques Brinon)]]></enclosure>
		 		         </item>
              <item>
    <title><![CDATA[Hyperloop One shows off super-speed propulsion technology]]></title>
    <link>http://www.ctvnews.ca/sci-tech/hyperloop-one-shows-off-super-speed-propulsion-technology-1.2898588</link>
    <description><![CDATA[A low-profile block of aluminum zipped across a short stretch of what looked like railroad tracks Wednesday before crashing into a tuft of sand and sending a small cloud into the clear skies of the desert north of Las Vegas.]]></description>
    <author></author>
          <dc:creator><![CDATA[Michelle Rindels]]></dc:creator>
              <creditLine><![CDATA[ The Associated Press]]></creditLine>
            <guid isPermaLink="false">1.2898588</guid>
    <pubDate>Wed, 11 May 2016 20:58:11 -0400</pubDate>
        <ctv:lastModifiedDate>Wed, 11 May 2016 20:58:11 -0400</ctv:lastModifiedDate>  
        			           <enclosure url="http://www.ctvnews.ca/polopoly_fs/1.2898594.1463014610!/httpImage/image.jpg_gen/derivatives/landscape_300/image.jpg"><![CDATA[People stand in a metal tube after a test of a Hyperloop One propulsion system, Wednesday, May 11, 2016, in North Las Vegas, Nev. (AP / John Locher)]]></enclosure>
		 		         </item>
              <item>
    <title><![CDATA[Solar Impulse 2 readies to leave for Oklahoma]]></title>
    <link>http://www.ctvnews.ca/sci-tech/solar-impulse-2-readies-to-leave-for-oklahoma-1.2898779</link>
    <description><![CDATA[A solar-powered airplane that landed in Arizona last week is headed to Oklahoma on the latest leg of its around-the-world journey.]]></description>
    <author></author>
              <creditLine><![CDATA[ The Associated Press]]></creditLine>
            <guid isPermaLink="false">1.2898779</guid>
    <pubDate>Thu, 12 May 2016 04:54:00 -0400</pubDate>
        <ctv:lastModifiedDate>Thu, 12 May 2016 08:59:00 -0400</ctv:lastModifiedDate>  
        			           <enclosure url="http://www.ctvnews.ca/polopoly_fs/1.2898780.1463042955!/httpImage/image.jpg_gen/derivatives/landscape_300/image.jpg"><![CDATA[Pilot Andre Borschberg lands the Swiss-made Solar Impulse 2 plane in Goodyear, Ariz. on Monday, May 2, 2016. (AP / Matt York)]]></enclosure>
		 		         </item>
              <item>
    <title><![CDATA['A great day for ocean science': Government to hire 135 new aquatic scientists]]></title>
    <link>http://www.ctvnews.ca/sci-tech/a-great-day-for-ocean-science-government-to-hire-135-new-aquatic-scientists-1.2898447</link>
    <description><![CDATA[The Liberal government is preparing to hire 135 new aquatic scientists, a major government hiring blitz that hasn’t been seen in the past decade. ]]></description>
    <author></author>
          <dc:creator><![CDATA[Graham Slaughter]]></dc:creator>
              <creditLine><![CDATA[CTVNews.ca]]></creditLine>
            <guid isPermaLink="false">1.2898447</guid>
    <pubDate>Wed, 11 May 2016 19:30:52 -0400</pubDate>
        <ctv:lastModifiedDate>Wed, 11 May 2016 19:30:52 -0400</ctv:lastModifiedDate>  
        			           <enclosure url="http://www.ctvnews.ca/polopoly_fs/1.2898465.1463009342!/httpImage/image.jpg_gen/derivatives/landscape_300/image.jpg"><![CDATA[A worker throws a sockeye salmon back into the river after counting it as the salmon make their way up the Adams River in Roderick Haig-Brown Provincial Park near Chase, B.C. Tuesday, Oct. 14, 2014. (THE CANADIAN PRESS / Jonathan Hayward)]]></enclosure>
		 		         </item>
              <item>
    <title><![CDATA[SpaceX Dragon departs space station, heads home with cargo]]></title>
    <link>http://www.ctvnews.ca/sci-tech/spacex-dragon-departs-space-station-heads-home-with-cargo-1.2897396</link>
    <description><![CDATA[A SpaceX capsule is headed back to Earth with precious science samples from NASA's one-year spaceman.]]></description>
    <author></author>
          <dc:creator><![CDATA[Marcia Dunn]]></dc:creator>
              <creditLine><![CDATA[ The Associated Press]]></creditLine>
            <guid isPermaLink="false">1.2897396</guid>
    <pubDate>Wed, 11 May 2016 09:38:00 -0400</pubDate>
        <ctv:lastModifiedDate>Wed, 11 May 2016 11:02:00 -0400</ctv:lastModifiedDate>  
        			           <enclosure url="http://www.ctvnews.ca/polopoly_fs/1.1598502.1452809380!/httpImage/image.jpg_gen/derivatives/landscape_300/image.jpg"><![CDATA[This May 23, 2010 image provided by NASA shows the International Space Station with the Earth in the background. (NASA)]]></enclosure>
		 		         </item>
              <item>
    <title><![CDATA[High-tech devices take cheating to new level in Thai schools]]></title>
    <link>http://www.ctvnews.ca/sci-tech/high-tech-devices-take-cheating-to-new-level-in-thai-schools-1.2897232</link>
    <description><![CDATA[Glasses with embedded cameras and smartwatches with stored information seem like regular spy equipment for the likes of James Bond, but for three students applying to medical school in Thailand, they were high-technology cheating devices.]]></description>
    <author></author>
          <dc:creator><![CDATA[Natnicha Chuwiruch]]></dc:creator>
              <creditLine><![CDATA[ The Associated Press]]></creditLine>
            <guid isPermaLink="false">1.2897232</guid>
    <pubDate>Wed, 11 May 2016 07:51:20 -0400</pubDate>
        <ctv:lastModifiedDate>Wed, 11 May 2016 07:51:20 -0400</ctv:lastModifiedDate>  
        			           <enclosure url="http://www.ctvnews.ca/polopoly_fs/1.2897234.1462967340!/httpImage/image.jpg_gen/derivatives/landscape_300/image.jpg"><![CDATA[In this Saturday May 7, 2016 photo by Asst.Prof.Pakarat Jumpanoi, shows three smartwatches used by students caught cheating in exams for admission to medical and dental faculties in Bangkok, Thailand. (Asst.Prof.Pakarat Jumpanoi/Rangsit University via AP)]]></enclosure>
		 		         </item>
        </channel>
</rss>
